arStrings.szText: Each {c_important}Dance of Knives{/c} knife Slows enemies by {c_number}[SF_8*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:MOD_SLOW}{/c} seconds and has a {c_number}[SF_24*100|%|]{/c} chance to pierce.

When you stop Channeling {c_important}Dance of Knives{/c}, drop up to {c_number}[SF_33]{/c} {c_important}Stun Grenades{/c}, each dealing {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_DAMAGE_FOR_GRENADES}{/c} damage. The Channeled duration determines how many are dropped.
Every {c_number}[SF_4]{/c} meters you travel while Channeling {c_important}Dance of Knives{/c} grants {c_number}[SF_30]{/c} |4Charge:Charges.
